About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is MingJie Huang. I'm a aspring software engineer, fresh graduate student with bachelor degree on Computer System Information. Always eager to learn new technologies. My main focuses are Web development and Mobile developement. I'm proficient with Java, Javascript, and various database SQL.

Emagid.com

Web Developer Intern

Collaborated with senior-level developers on developing projects throughout various phases of project lifecycle.Contributed to design and development of client and server database application. Updated and maintained HTML/CSS/JS/PHP templates on a regular basis and as required. Planned and implemented dynamic and e-commerce applications. Maintained existing code and functionality during implementation into ongoing operations of web business. Provided technical support to other team members as directed.

Federal Reserve Bank of New York

CUNY Scholar (as part of the CUNY Service Corps)

Analyzed and computed data products of former corps member. Developed new data products. Assisted seniors to develop learning tools for the Bank via script languages

NOYCE Intern (Technology Assistant)

Managed and rearranged of all hardware equipment for the entire building. Provided first-level technical support to students and faculty on proprietary software and applications, including installations of Windows and Mac operating system platforms.
